description: This Python source file defines a test case class for performing sanity checks on build tools within an SDK environment. It verifies that certain tools (wget and tar) are sourced from the SDK's build tools directory, ensuring correct build tool installation.

classes.name: SanityTests
classes.description: A test case class inheriting from OESDKTestCase that contains methods to verify the correctness of build tools within the SDK.

methods.name: test_tools(self)
methods.description: Test method that checks whether 'wget' and 'tar' commands are sourced from the SDK build tools directory.
